items.title: Collaborative Task Creation and Assignment
items.description: Enable users to create tasks, assign them to team members, and set deadlines within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a task with title, description, assignee, and due date
Assigned team member receives a notification upon task assignment
Task appears in both creator's and assignee's task lists
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment actions should complete within 2 seconds

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core functionality includes task creation, assignment, deadlines, and notifications as part of collaboration.
